name: Dice Game, the Game
description:
Things Are About To Get Dicey

Take on famous video game knock-offs in this retro arcade themed dice rolling game of luck, sweat, and tears!

Take turns against your opponent rolling handfuls of dice, then re-roll as many as you like to try and get the best combination possible. The better the combination, the more damage you'll deal to your opponent.

But be careful! Whenever you roll a Ghost it can't be re-rolled, and will automatically deal damage to you instead!

How far will you push your luck... ?
